data.message: How do I add the reply button in my comments?

replies.message: Hey Kristen. Would you mind giving a little more information about your issue so we can better explain it to our product team? -Sarah

When people comment on a status there is now a like and reply under their comment...so you can reply to them personally like I a. Fanpage.  All my friends seem to have that option on their personal pages but I don't.
I have the same problem about the reply button.
I have the same issue as well. How do I add the reply button on the status and photos that i've been posting?

Dear Facebook administrators,    
Am the user of the link as it is written above.
Friends,Who is in my list having warning problem if there is any posted link in my page
i just wish you to help me to delet that warning note from my page and want to get my page taken out of spam list.
Please help me to get this problem sorted shortly.
Best regards.
Antiakit
Help me please.
